"), code: { [r: cur_Monster = getGroup(id, i, 0)] [h: id2 = strfind(cur_Monster, "[\\w,\\/,\\',\\-,\\s]+(?=\\s\\()")] [h: rgx_Name = getGroup(id2, 1, 0)] [h: temp.NameIndex = json.set(temp.NameIndex,rgx_Name,temp.index)] [h: setProperty("hmb.monster."+temp.index,cur_Monster)] [h: temp.index = temp.index +1] }] [h: setProperty("hmb.NameIndex",temp.NameIndex)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This macro takes String as Argument -->
<!-- This macro sets up the inventory system on token property matching the name of string -->

[H: InventoryLocation = macro.args]
[H: JsonValidTest = json.type(eval(InventoryLocation))]

[H, if(JsonValidTest == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: eval(InventoryLocation + ' = "{}" ' )]
};{
	
}]

<!-- Setup Item Types -->

[H: ItemTypeJsonArray = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "ItemTypes")]
[H: ItemTypeList = json.toList(ItemTypeJsonArray)]

[H: fail = input("NewItemTypeList | " + ItemTypeList + " | Enter the list of possible items | Text | WIDTH=80 ")]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewItemTypeJsonArray = json.fromList(NewItemTypeList)]
[H: eval(InventoryLocation + ' = json.set(eval(InventoryLocation), "ItemTypes", NewItemTypeJsonArray)' )]

<!-- Setup Item Properties for Item Types -->

[H: ItemPropertiesJson = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "Properties")]
[H, if(json.type(ItemPropertiesJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: ItemPropertiesJson  = "{}" ]
};{

}]


[H: InputString = 'input(']

[foreach(Type, NewItemTypeList, ""), code: {
	[H: InputString = InputString + ' " ' + replace(Type," ","_") + 'Properties | ' + json.toList(json.get(ItemPropertiesJson, Type)) + ' | Enter properties of item type ' + Type + ' | Text | WIDTH=80 ", ']
}]

[H: InputString = InputString + ' "")']
[H: fail = eval(InputString)]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewItemPropertiesJson = "{}"]
[foreach(Type, NewItemTypeList, ""), code: {

	[H: NewItemPropertiesJson = json.set(NewItemPropertiesJson, Type, json.fromList(eval( replace(Type," ","_")  + "Properties")) )]

}]

[H: eval(InventoryLocation + ' = json.set(eval(InventoryLocation), "Properties", NewItemPropertiesJson)' )]

<!-- Edit Equipment Slots -->

[H: EquipSlotsJsonArray = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "EquipSlots")]
[H: EquipSlotsList = json.toList(EquipSlotsJsonArray)]

[H: fail = input("NewEquipSlotsList | " + EquipSlotsList + " | Enter the list of possible slots a player can equip | Text | WIDTH=80 ")]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewEquipSlotsJsonArray = json.fromList(NewEquipSlotsList)]
[H: eval(InventoryLocation + ' = json.set(eval(InventoryLocation), "EquipSlots", NewEquipSlotsJsonArray)' )]


<!-- Edit what Items can be used in Equipment Slots -->

[H: ItemTypeJsonArray = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "ItemTypes")]
[H: ItemTypeList = json.toList(ItemTypeJsonArray)]
[H: EquipSlotTypesJson = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "EquipSlotTypes")]
[H, if(json.type(EquipSlotTypesJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: EquipSlotTypesJson  = "{}" ]
};{

}]

[H: InputString = 'input(']

[foreach(Type, NewEquipSlotsList, ""), code: {

	[H: InputString = InputString + ' "TAB | ' + Type + ' || TAB",']
	[H: JsonTypeCheck = json.get(EquipSlotTypesJson, Type)]

	[foreach(ItemType, ItemTypeList, ""), code: {	
		
		[H, if(json.type(JsonTypeCheck) == "UNKNOWN"):
		InputString = InputString + ' " ' + replace(Type, " ", "_") + replace(ItemType, " ", "_") + ' | 0 | Player can equip ' + ItemType + ' in this slot | CHECK ", '  ;
		InputString = InputString + ' " ' + replace(Type, " ", "_") + replace(ItemType, " ", "_") + ' | ' + json.contains(json.get(EquipSlotTypesJson, Type), ItemType) + ' | Player can equip ' + ItemType + ' in this slot | CHECK ", ']
		
	}]

}]

[H: InputString = InputString + ' "")']
[H: fail = eval(InputString)]
[H: abort(fail)]

[H: NewEquipSlotTypesJson = "{}"]

[foreach(Type, NewEquipSlotsList, ""), code: {

	[H: NewList = ""]	

	[foreach(ItemType, ItemTypeList, ""), code: {	

 		[H: NewList = if(eval(replace(Type, " ", "_") + replace(ItemType, " ", "_")) == 1, listAppend(NewList, ItemType) , NewList)]
	}]

	[H: NewEquipSlotTypesJson = json.set(NewEquipSlotTypesJson, Type, json.fromList(NewList) )]

}]

[H: eval(InventoryLocation + ' = json.set(eval(InventoryLocation), "EquipSlotTypes", NewEquipSlotTypesJson)' )]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Setup Inventory

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Array containing all Item types for inventory -->
[if(argCount() != 1), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 1 arguments | You called returnItemTypes with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
}]

[H: macro.return = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "ItemTypes")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: returnItemTypes

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Array containing all slots -->
[if(argCount() != 1), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 1 arguments | You called returnEquipSlots with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
}]


[H: macro.return = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "EquipSlots")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: returnEquipSlots

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns the total number of that item type -->
[if(argCount() != 2), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 2 arguments | You called returnItemsOfTypeLength with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
	[H: ItemType = arg(1)]
}]


[H: AllItemsJson = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "Items")]
[H, if(json.type(AllItemsJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: AllItemsJson = "{}"]
};
{

}]

[H: ItemsOfTypeJson = json.get(AllItemsJson, ItemType)]
[H, if(json.type(ItemsOfTypeJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: macro.return = 0]
};
{
	[H: macro.return = json.length(ItemsOfTypeJson)]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: returnItemsOfTypeLength

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Object containing the Item Properties. If item is not found it returns an empty Json Object -->
[if(argCount() != 3), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 3 arguments | You called returnItem with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
	[H: ItemType = arg(1)]
	[H: ItemNumber = arg(2)]
}]


[H: AllItemsJson = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "Items")]
[H, if(json.type(AllItemsJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: AllItemsJson = "{}"]
};{}]

[H: ItemsOfType = json.get(AllItemsJson, ItemType)]
[H, if(json.type(ItemsOfType) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: ItemsOfType = "[{}]"]
};{}]

[macro("returnItemsOfTypeLength@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(InventoryLocation + "," + ItemType)]
[H, if(macro.return > ItemNumber), code: {
	[H: macro.return = json.get(ItemsOfType, ItemNumber)]
};{
	[H: macro.return = "{}"]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: returnItem

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Array containing the Json Objects of all Item Properties for that type -->
[if(argCount() != 2), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 2 arguments | You called returnItemsOfType with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
	[H: ItemType = arg(1)]
}]

[H: AllItemsJson = json.get(eval(InventoryLocation), "Items")]
[H, if(json.type(AllItemsJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: macro.return = "{}"]
};{
	[H: macro.return = json.get(AllItemsJson, ItemType)]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: returnItemsOfType

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This is basic item editor for the Inventory System and and you can use it's code as an example on how to make your own editors --> [H: InventoryLocation = json.get(macro.args, 0)]
<!-- Player Selects the type of Item --> [macro("returnItemTypes@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(InventoryLocation) ] [H: ListOfItemTypes = json.toList(macro.return)]
[H: fail = input("SelectedItemType | " + ListOfItemTypes + " | Choose Type of Item to Edit | LIST | VALUE=STRING")] [H: abort(fail)]
<!-- Player selects the Item of that type --> [macro("returnListOfItemsForType@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(InventoryLocation + "," + SelectedItemType) ] [H: ItemSelectionList = listAppend(macro.return, "New Item")]
[H: fail = input("SelectedItemNumber | " + ItemSelectionList + " | Choose Type of Item to Edit | LIST ")] [H: abort(fail)]
<!-- Player Edits the Item --> [macro("returnItem@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(InventoryLocation + "," + SelectedItemType + "," + SelectedItemNumber) ] [H: SelectedItem = macro.return]
[macro("returnPropertiesOfType@"+getMacroLocation()): json.fromList(InventoryLocation + "," + SelectedItemType) ] [H: ListOfItemProperties = json.toList(macro.return)]
[H: ItemInput = 'input(" LabelDisplay | Values | ' + SelectedItemType + ' Properties | LABEL", ' ] [H, for(PropertiesCount, 0, listCount(ListOfItemProperties)), code: { [H: CurrentProperty = listGet(ListOfItemProperties, PropertiesCount)]
[H, if(json.type(SelectedItem) == "UNKNOWN"): ValueOfCurrentProperty = "" ; ValueOfCurrentProperty = json.get(SelectedItem, CurrentProperty) ]
[H: ItemInput = ItemInput + ' " New' + replace(CurrentProperty, " ", "_") + ' | ' + ValueOfCurrentProperty + ' | ' + CurrentProperty + ' | TEXT | WIDTH=30" ,']
}]
[H: ItemInput = ItemInput + ' "DeleteItem | 0 | Delete This Item | CHECK ")'] [H: fail = eval(ItemInput)] [H: abort(fail)]
<!-- Editor Saves/Deletes Item --> [if(DeleteItem), code: { [macro("deleteItem@"+getMacroLocation()):json.fromList(InventoryLocation + "," + SelectedItemType + "," + SelectedItemNumber)]
};{ [H: NewItemJson = "{}"] [H, for(PropertiesCount, 0, listCount(ListOfItemProperties)), code: { [H: CurrentProperty = listGet(ListOfItemProperties, PropertiesCount)] [H: NewItemJson = json.set(NewItemJson, CurrentProperty, eval('New' + replace(CurrentProperty, " ", "_")) )] }]

<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Array containing the Json Objects of all Item Properties for that type -->
[if(argCount() != 2), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 2 arguments | You called returnItemsOfType with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
	[H: ItemType = arg(1)]
}]


[H: MasterDB = getLibProperty(InventoryLocation,getMacroLocation())]
[H: AllItemsJson = json.get(MasterDB, "Items")]
[H, if(json.type(AllItemsJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: macro.return = "{}"]
};
{
	[H: macro.return = json.get(AllItemsJson, ItemType)]
}]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Array containing the Json Objects of all Item Properties for that type -->
[if(argCount() != 2), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 2 arguments | You called returnItemsOfType with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
	[H: ItemType = arg(1)]
}]

[H: ListOfItemProperties = json.toList(inventory.returnPropertiesOfType(InventoryLocation,ItemType))]

[H: NewItemJson =  "{}"]
[H, for(PropertiesCount, 0, listCount(ListOfItemProperties)), code: {
	[H: CurrentProperty = listGet(ListOfItemProperties, PropertiesCount)]
	[H: NewItemJson = json.set(NewItemJson, CurrentProperty, 0) )]
}]

[H: macro.return = NewItemJson]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Object containing the Item Properties. If item is not found it returns an empty Json Object -->
[if(argCount() != 3), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 3 arguments | You called returnItem with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
	[H: ItemType = arg(1)]
	[H: ItemNumber = arg(2)]
}]

[H: MasterDB = getLibProperty(InventoryLocation,getMacroLocation())]

[H: AllItemsJson = json.get(MasterDB, "Items")]
[H, if(json.type(AllItemsJson) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: AllItemsJson = "{}"]
};{

}]

[H: ItemsOfType = json.get(AllItemsJson, ItemType)]
[H, if(json.type(ItemsOfType) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
	[H: ItemsOfType = "[{}]"]
};{

}]

[TypeLength = master.returnItemsOfTypeLength(InventoryLocation,ItemType)]
[H, if(TypeLength > ItemNumber), code: {
	[H: macro.return = json.get(ItemsOfType, ItemNumber)]
};{
	[H: macro.return = "{}"]
}]

}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: MDB_returnItemsOfTypeLength

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a list of all items of Type. It uses the first Property of the Item to create the list. -->
[if(argCount() != 2), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 2 arguments | You called returnListOfItemsForType with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
	[H: ItemType = arg(1)]
}]

[H: ItemProperties = master.returnPropertiesOfType(InventoryLocation,ItemType)]
[H: ListOfItemProperties = json.toList(ItemProperties)]
[H: ItemPropertyUsedForList = json.get(ItemProperties, 0)]

[H: AllItemsOfType = master.returnItemsOfType(InventoryLocation,ItemType)]

[H: NumberOfItems = master.returnItemsOfTypeLength(InventoryLocation,ItemType)]

[H: ItemList = ""]
[H, for(ItemCount, 0, NumberOfItems), code: {
	[H: CurrentItemOfSelectedType = json.get(AllItemsOfType, ItemCount)]
	
	[H, if(json.type(CurrentItemOfSelectedType) == "UNKNOWN"), code: {
		[H: CurrentItemOfSelectedType = "{}"]
		[H: ItemList = listAppend(ItemSelectionList, "NULL")]
	};{
		[H: ItemList = listAppend(ItemList, json.get(CurrentItemOfSelectedType, ItemPropertyUsedForList))]
	}]
}]

[H: macro.return = ItemList]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: MDB_returnListOfItemsForType

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument -->
<!-- This Macro returns a Json Array containing all Item types for inventory -->
[if(argCount() != 1), code: {
	[H: input("FAIL | This function requires 1 arguments | You called returnItemTypes with " + argCount() + " arguments |  LABEL") ]
	[H: abort(0)]
};{
	[H: InventoryLocation = arg(0)]
}]

[H: MasterDB = getLibProperty(InventoryLocation,getMacroLocation())]
[H: macro.return = json.get(MasterDB, "ItemTypes")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: MDB_returnItemTypes

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- This macro begins calls the setup macro on the Lib:Token and begins setting up the inventory system. The default location is Inventory but you can change which variable is used to store the inventory by entering it's name instead --> [macro("Setup Inventory@Lib:UniversalInventorySystem"): "Spells"]
[macro("CleanInventory@Lib:UniversalInventorySystem"): "Spells"]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Call Spell Setup

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [macro("Dialog Item Editor@Lib:UniversalInventorySystem"): "Spells"]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Call Dialog Spells Editor

{"ItemTypes":["Spell"],"Properties":{"Spell":["Name","ID","Memorized","Level","BaseSP","CastTime","Comp","Range","Area","Duration","Save","Damage","AddSP","PageRef","Desc","Macro"]},"EquipSlots":[""],"EquipSlotTypes":{},"Items":{"Spell":[{"Name":"Deep Sleep","ID":0,"Memorized":1,"Level":1,"BaseSP":50,"CastTime":1,"Comp":"V,S,M","Range":40,"Area":"Selected creatures in 30-foot radius","Duration":60,"Save":"Negates","Damage":0,"AddSP":"Increase Hit Points Affected: 1 SP/1 HP Increase Duration: 1 SP/minute","PageRef":"HMB p87","Desc":"This spell causes the targeted creature(s), all of whom must be within a thirty-foot radius of one another, to fall into a deep sleep if they fail a saving throw. Slumbering creatures can be awakened only by slapping, kicking or more stringent methods. When casting, the mage identifies the particular creature(s) he wishes to affect. The spell effect is limited to a number of creatures whose combined maximum Hit Points are less than or equal to 90 Hit Points. Should the mages targets exceed this total, the creatures with the fewest HP are affected first. A mage may allocate more Spell Points to increase this HP total, but he must do so at the time of casting, not after learning the combined HP total of his opponents (assuming his GM is so inept as to reveal this information). Creatures that do not sleep (e.g., undead) are unaffected by this spell.","Macro":""},{"Name":"Illusionary Mural","ID":1,"Memorized":1,"Level":"0A","BaseSP":30,"CastTime":10,"Comp":"V,S","Range":30,"Area":"10sqft","Duration":"Special","Save":"Negates","Damage":0,"AddSP":"Increase Area of Effect: 1 SP/ 5 square feet","PageRef":"HMB p85","Desc":"The Illusionary Mural spell conjures up a visual-only illusion that lacks depth. When viewed straight on, it can often fool a viewer because depth can be faked by visual trickery and perspective. However, when viewed from an angle of 30 degrees or more, the colors wash out and the illusionary nature of the depiction is immediately obvious. Proper execution of this illusion is highly dependant on the artistic skill of the caster. A highly skilled painter can employ his knowledge of visual cues, perspective and similar techniques to create a complex illusion capable of deceiving all but the most astute viewer. Those without such training are advised to keep it simple. The spell persists for as long as the caster maintains concentration (preventing movement or casting another spell and the like) or until someone touches the illusion.","Macro":""},{"Name":"Enrage","ID":2,"Memorized":1,"Level":"0J","BaseSP":40,"CastTime":1,"Comp":"V,S,M","Range":60,"Area":"One individual","Duration":60,"Save":"Negates","Damage":0,"AddSP":"Increase Range: 2 SP/5 feet Increase Volume of Effect: 30 SP per individual (maximum 4 individuals)","PageRef":"HMB p86","Desc":"The Enrage spell causes the target to become incredibly angry at the caster. The target rushes towards the mage as quickly as possible, then begins to attack him (or, hopefully, the mages front line of fighters) with melee weapons or fists (if the target is unarmed). If stymied by an obstacle or hazard, the target uses ranged weapons instead. Creatures with an Intelligence score of less than 3 or who succeed at a saving throw are unaffected by this spell. The verbal component of this spell is rude words, the somatic component is rude gestures and the material component is a bit of the caster's snot or phlegm.","Macro":""}]}}

[dialog("HackMasterHelp", "temp=1;width=265;height=356;input=1"): { Hackmaster Basic Framework


You are using the HackMaster Basic Framework for Maptools v1.95.

Note: Maptools Default Exploding Rolls have been overwritten with a custom function to impliment Penetrating Dice. The roll format is XdYe in brackets. If it is possible to penetrate with a number less than the max on the die the format XdYesZ is used. Where Z is the target number that the roll must equal or exceed.

}] [abort(0)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--Targets the Largest Wound with Healing, any spillover goes to the next largest wound -->
[h, if(macro.args==""), code:
{
	[Healing=Healing_Amount]
};
{
	[Healing=macro.args]
}]
[h: MaxWound=0]
[h: MaxCount=-1]
[h, foreach(curwound, Wounds, ","), code:
{
	[if(json.get(curwound,"Sev")>MaxWound), code:
	{
		[MaxCount=roll.count]
		[MaxWound=json.get(curwound,"Sev")]
	};
	{
	}]
}]
[h, if(MaxCount>-1), code:
{
	[curwound=json.get(Wounds,MaxCount)]

	[HighestSev=json.get(curwound,"Sev")]
	[SpillOver=if(HighestSev<Healing,Healing-HighestSev,0)]

	[curwound=json.set(curwound, "Sev", max(json.get(curwound,"Sev")-Healing,0))]
	[Wounds=json.set(Wounds,MaxCount,curwound)]

	[h, if(SpillOver>0), code:
	{
		[macro("HealWound@this"): SpillOver]
	};
	{
		[macro("CleanWounds@Lib:HackMaster"): ""]
	}]
};
{
	[macro("CleanWounds@Lib:HackMaster"): ""]	
}]

<! Add Skill SubType --> <!-- This Macro takes a Json Array Argument --> <!-- This Macro returns a Json Object containing the Skill Properties. If item is not found it returns an empty Json Object --> [if(argCount() != 4), code: { [H: input("FAIL | This function requires 3 arguments | You called returnItem with " + argCount() + " arguments | LABEL") ] [H: abort(0)] };{ [H: Skill = arg(0)] <!--Json--> [H: Subtype = arg(1)] <!--String--> [H: Mastery = arg(2)] <!--Number--> [H: ItemNumber = arg(3)] <!--Current Index--> }]
[H: Skill=json.set(Skill,"R"+ItemNumber+1,Mastery)] [H: Mastery = Mastery + json.get(Skill,"RTotal")] [h: Skill=json.set(Skill,"RTotal",Mastery)] [h: Skill=json.set(Skill,"Tally",json.get(Skill,"Tally")+1)] [h: Skill=json.set(Skill,"Subskill",Subtype)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--Copy Data From Input Form To Token--> [h: varsFromStrProp(macro.args)]
<!-- Skills the Player Has some Mastery In Skill Data Structure Json Name Abilitys Modifier Cost Universal Subskill Prereq Tally R0 R1 R2 R3 R4 R5 R6 R7 R8 R9 R10 RTotal --> [h: loops=0] [h: InsertCnt = 0] [while(loops < json.length(Skills)-InsertCnt, ""), code: { [h: curSkill = json.get(Skills,loops+InsertCnt)] [h: str = "skill"+loops] [h: str2 = "Subskill"+loops] [h: tempMastery = eval(str)] [h: tempSubSkill = eval(str2)] [if(eval(str) > json.get(curSkill,"RTotal") && eval(str2) == "NONE"), code: { [h: curSkill=json.set(curSkill,"RTotal",eval(str))] [h: curSkill=json.set(curSkill,"Tally",1)] [h: Skills=json.set(Skills,loops+InsertCnt,curSkill)] };{}] [if(eval(str) > json.get(curSkill,"RTotal") && eval(str2) != "NONE" && eval(str2) != "(type)"), code: { [h: Skills=hmb.addSubSkill(curSkill,tempSubSkill,tempMastery,loops+InsertCnt)] [h: InsertCnt=InsertCnt+1] };{}]
[h: loops = loops+1] }]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: assert( argCount() == 3, "json.insert(): Requires exactly three parameters.", 0 ) ] [H: Array = arg( 0 ) ] [H: Index = arg( 1 ) ] [H: Value = arg( 2 ) ] [H: assert( json.type( Array ) == "ARRAY", "json.insert(): First parameter must be a JSON array.", 0 ) ] [H: assert( isNumber( Index ), "json.insert(): Second parameter must be a number.", 0 ) ] [H: Length = json.length( Array ) ] [H: Index = max( min( Length, Index ), 0 ) ] [H, if( Index == Length ), code: { [ Array = json.append( Array, Value ) ] };{ [ BeforeIndex = if( Index >= 1, json.get( Array, 0, Index-1 ), "[]" ) ] [ AfterIndex = json.get( Array, Index, Length-1 ) ] [ Value = json.append( "", Value ) ] [ Array = json.merge( BeforeIndex, Value, AfterIndex ) ] } ] [H: macro.return = Array ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: json.insert

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--Setup Input Token Class Data-->
[e: varsFromStrProp(macro.args)]<!--Action,Move-->
[h: NewProf = inventory.returnEmptyItemOfType("Talents","Proficiency")]
[H: Proficiencies = inventory.returnItemsOfType("Talents","Proficiency")]
[H: Proficiencies = if(json.type(Proficiencies) == "UNKNOWN","{}",Proficiencies)]

<!-- If Next Button Pushed-->
[h, if(save == "Next >>"), code:
{
	[Dialog("Character Generator","width=480; height=350; temporary=1; input=1; noframe=0"):
	{
		[macro("CharGenStep10HTML@Lib:HackMaster"): 0]
	}]

	[h: abort(0)]
};{}]

<!-- If Combat Prof Added Button Pushed-->
[h, if(AddCombat == "ADD"), code:
{
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"Name",Name_W)]
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"ID",ID_W)]
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"Type",Type_W)]
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"Desc",Desc_W)]
	[h: inventory.setItem("Talents","Proficiency",ID_W,NewProf)]
	
	[Dialog("Character Generator","width=480; height=350; temporary=1; input=1; noframe=0"):
	{
		[macro("CharGenStep10prof_HTML@Lib:HackMaster"): 0]
	}]

	[h: abort(0)]
};{}]

<!-- If Other Prof Added Button Pushed-->
[h, if(AddOther == "ADD"), code:
{
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"Name",Name_X)]
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"ID",ID_X)]
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"Type",Type_X)]
	[h: NewProf = json.set(NewProf,"Desc",Desc_X)]
	[h: inventory.setItem("Talents","Proficiency",ID_X,NewProf)]
	
	[Dialog("Character Generator","width=480; height=350; temporary=1; input=1; noframe=0"):
	{
		[macro("CharGenStep10prof_HTML@Lib:HackMaster"): 0]
	}]

	[h: abort(0)]
};{}]

<!-- Check for Deleted Prof -->
[h: result = ""]
[h, for(Count,0,json.length(Proficiencies),1,""), code:
{
	[h: result = if(eval("Delete"+Count) == "Delete", Count, result)]
}]
[h, if(result != ""), code:
{
	[h: inventory.deleteItem("Talents","Proficiency",result)]
};
{}]

[Dialog("Character Generator","width=480; height=350; temporary=1; input=1; noframe=0"):
{
	[macro("CharGenStep10prof_HTML@Lib:HackMaster"): 0]
}]

[h: abort(0)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--Copy Data From Input Form To Token-->
[h: varsFromStrProp(macro.args)]<!--Action,Move-->

[h: Strength = eval(txt_STR+"")]
[h: Intelligence = eval(txt_INT+"")]
[h: Wisdom = eval(txt_WIS+"")]
[h: Dexterity = eval(txt_DEX+"")]
[h: Constitution = eval(txt_CON+"")]
[h: Looks = eval(txt_LKS+"")]
[h: Charisma = eval(txt_CHA+"")]

[h: Level=1]

<!--Process Race-->
[h, if(Race == "Human"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=10]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Dwarf"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=10]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Elf"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=5]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Gnome"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=5]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Gnome Titan"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=5]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Gnomeling"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=5]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Grel"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=10]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Halfling"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=5]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Half-Elf(E)"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=7]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Half-Elf(H)"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=8]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Half-Orc"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=10]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Pixie-Fairy"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=0]
};{}]
[h, if(Race == "Sil-Karg"), code:
{
	[MaxHP=10]
};{}]

<!--Process Class-->
[h, if(Class == "Fighter"), code:
{
	[h: TOP = "[r: floor(MaxHP * (0.3+0.02*Level))]"]
};{}]
[h, if(Class == "Ranger"), code:
{
};{}]
[h, if(Class == "Mage"), code:
{
};{}]
[h, if(Class == "Cleric"), code:
{
};{}]
[h, if(Class == "Thief"), code:
{
};{}]
[h, if(Class == "Rogue"), code:
{
};{}]

<!--Calc Total HitPoints-->
[h: MaxHP=MaxHP+floor(Constitution)+txt_HPRoll]
[h: HP=MaxHP]

<!--Setup Skill List with Initial Values-->
[h, if(json.isEmpty(Skills) == 1), code:
{
	[macro("InitializeSkillList@Lib:HackMaster"): 0]
};{}]
<!--Init Blank Talent Structures-->
[h, if(json.isEmpty(Talents) == 1), code:
{
	[h: Talents = getLibProperty("Talents","Lib:UniversalInventorySystem")]
};{}]
<!--Init Blank Equipment Structures-->
[h, if(json.isEmpty(Inventory) == 1), code:
{
	[h: Inventory = getLibProperty("PlayerInv","Lib:UniversalInventorySystem")]
};{}]
<!--Calculate Initial Combat Profile-->
[h, if(json.isEmpty(CurrentProfile) == 1), code:
{
	[macro("CalcCombatProfile@Lib:HackMaster"): 0]
};{}]

<!-- Display Next Screen -->
[Dialog("Character Generator","width=480; height=350; temporary=1; input=1; noframe=0"):
{
	[macro("CharGenStep10HTML@Lib:HackMaster"): 0]
}]

[abort(0)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--
	Macro: Melee Defense Roll
-->
[h: dieMod=0]
[h: crit=1d6e-1]
[h: mod=macro.args+0]

<!-- 
Check for Shield
-->
[h, if(getPropertyType() == "HM_PC"), code:
{
	[h: OffHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","OffHand")]
	[h: WBaseType=if(json.get(OffHand, "BaseType")=="Shield","Shield","NONE")]
	[h: DefaultDie=if(WBaseType=="NONE",3,4)]
	[h: ShieldUsed = if(DefaultDie==4,1,0)]
};
{
	[h: OffHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","OffHand")]
	[h: WBaseType=if(json.get(OffHand, "BaseType")=="Shield","Shield","NONE")]
	[h: DefaultDie=if(WBaseType=="NONE",3,4)]
	[h: ShieldUsed = if(DefaultDie==4,1,0)]
	[h: DefaultDie=if(ShieldUse==1,DefaultDie,4)]
}]

[h: i_chkShield=0]
[h:status=input(
    "junkVar||Melee Defense Roll|LABEL|TEXT=FALSE",
    "i_dieSize|d8e,d10e,d12e,d20e-4,d20e|Die Size|RADIO|ORIENT=H SELECT="+DefaultDie+" VALUE=STRING",
	"i_mods|0|Modifiers",
	"i_chkDex|1|Dex|CHECK",
	"i_chkWis|1|Wis|CHECK",
	if(DefaultDie==3,"","i_chkShield|1|Shield|CHECK"))]
[h: abort(status)]

<!-- 
USE DEX?
-->
[h, if(getPropertyType() == "HM_PC" && i_chkDex==0), code:
{
	[h: varMods=json.get(hmb.getDexMods(),"DEF")]
	[h: mod=mod+if(varMods>0,-VarMods,VarMods)]
};
{}]

<!-- 
USE WIS?
-->
[h, if(getPropertyType() == "HM_PC" && i_chkWis==0), code:
{
	[h: varMods=json.get(hmb.getWisMods(),"DEF")]
	[h: mod=mod+if(varMods>0,-VarMods,VarMods)]
};
{}]

<!-- 
USE SHIELD?
-->
[h: ShieldUsed = if(i_chkShield == 0 && ShieldUsed==1,0,ShieldUsed)]
[h, if(getPropertyType() == "HM_PC" && i_chkShield==0 && WBaseType=="Shield"), code:
{
	[h: SBaseID = json.get(OffHand, "ID_BaseType")]
	[h: BaseShield = master.returnItem("Inventory","Shield",SBaseID)]
	[h: varMods = json.get(BaseShield,"Defense")]
	[h: mod = mod + if(varMods>0,-VarMods,VarMods)]
};
{
}]

[h, if(getPropertyType() == "HM_NPC"), code:
{
	[if(ShieldUse==1 && i_chkShield==0 && WBaseType=="Shield"), code:
	{
		[h: SBaseID = json.get(OffHand, "ID_BaseType")]
		[h: BaseShield = master.returnItem("Inventory","Shield",SBaseID)]
		[h: varMods = json.get(BaseShield,"Defense")]
		[h: mod = mod + if(varMods>0,-VarMods,VarMods)]
	};{}]
};{}]

[h: actualRoll=if(i_dieSize == "d20e" || i_dieSize == "d20e-4", d20, eval(i_dieSize))]
[h: dieMod=if(i_dieSize == "d20e-4", -4, dieMod)]
[h: mod=mod+i_mods+0]

[h: roll = max(actualRoll+dieMod,1)]

Rolls for Defense:

[if(actualRoll==20), code:
{
	[h: macro.return="total="+(roll+crit+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll+crit)+if(dieMod==-4,-4,"")+"+"+mod+"; ShieldUsed="+ShieldUsed+"; DefenseCrit="+1]	
	a Perfect Defense!
};
{
	[h: macro.return="total="+(roll+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll)+if(dieMod==-4,-4,"")+"+"+mod+"; ShieldUsed="+ShieldUsed+"; DefenseCrit="+if(actualRoll==1,-1,0)]
}]

[if(actualRoll==19), code:
{
	a Near Perfect Defense!
};{}]

[if(getPropertyType() == "HM_NPC"), code:
{
	[h: i_Class="NONE"]
};
{
	[h: i_Class=Class]
}]
[if(actualRoll==18 && if(i_Class == "Thief" || i_Class == "Rogue",1,0)), code:
{
	a Near Perfect Defense!
};{}]

[if(actualRoll==1), code:
{
	a FUMBLE!
};{}]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Determine Fighting Styles: 
	Weapon/Shield.
	UNARMED :No Weapons/Shields Equipped
	Range	:Large Ranged Equipped Not Sytles Needed
	H2		:Two-handed Weapon. 
	W1		:One-handed Weapon only. 
	H1H2	:One handed weapon, used two-handed.
	W1W1O	:Two one-handed weapons, attacking with both.
	W1W1D	:Two one-handed weapons, defending with secondary weapon.
	S1		:Shield only.
	S1S1	:Two shields only.
	W1S1	:1 Weapon, One Shield
-->
[h:  TwoHands = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","TwoHands")]
[h:  MainHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","MainHand")]
[h:  OffHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","OffHand")]
[h:  FStyle = ""]

[h, if(json.isEmpty(TwoHands)), code:
{
	<!-- Is not 2-Handed Style -->
};
{
	<!-- 	
		Which Two Handed Style? 
		Two-handed Weapon.
		One handed weapon, used two-handed.		
	-->
	[e: WBaseType = json.get(TwoHands, "BaseType")]
	[H: WBaseID = json.get(TwoHands, "ID_BaseType")]
	[H: BaseWeapon = master.returnItem("Inventory",WBaseType,WBaseID)]	
	
	[h: FStyle=if(json.get(BaseWeapon,"Size")=="L","H2","H1H2")]
	[h: FStyle=if(WBaseType=="Range Weapon","Range",FStyle)]
}]

[e, if(json.isEmpty(MainHand)), code:
{
	<!-- No Item In Main Hand -->
};
{
	[h: WBaseType = json.get(MainHand, "BaseType")]
	
	[e: FStyle=if(WBaseType=="Melee Weapon","M1","")]
	[h: FStyle=if(WBaseType=="Shield","S1",FStyle)]
}]

[e, if(json.isEmpty(OffHand)), code:
{
	<!-- No Item in off Hand -->
};
{
	[h: W2BaseType = json.get(OffHand, "BaseType")]
	
	[e: FStyle=if(W2BaseType=="Melee Weapon",FStyle+"M1",FStyle)]
	[h: FStyle=if(W2BaseType=="Shield",FStyle+"S1",FStyle)]
}]

[h, if(FStyle=="M1M1"), code:
{
	[H: fail = input("Style | Offensive, Defensive | Choose style to use | LIST | VALUE=STRING")]
	[H: abort(fail)]
	[h: FStyle= if(Style=="Offensive",FStyle+"O",FStyle+"D")]
};
{}]

[h: FightingStyle = FStyle]
[e: macro.return = FStyle]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: getFightingStyle

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Determine Fighting Styles: Weapon/Shield. UNARMED :No Weapons/Shields Equipped Range :Large Ranged Equipped Not Sytles Needed M1S1 :1 Weapon, One Shield H2 :Two-handed Weapon. M1 :One-handed Weapon only. H1H2 :One handed weapon, used two-handed. M1M1O :Two one-handed weapons, attacking with both. M1M1D :Two one-handed weapons, defending with secondary weapon. S1 :Shield only. S1S1 :Two shields only. -->
[h: TypeProfile = master.returnEmptyItemOfType('Enhancement','MagicType')] [h: TypeProfile2 = master.returnEmptyItemOfType('Enhancement','MagicType')]
<!-- Two Handed Weapon --> [h, if(FightingStyle=="H2" || FightingStyle=="H1H2"), code: { [h: varMods = hmb.getStrMods()] [h: oldDmg = json.get(varMods,"DMG")] [h: TempStr=Strength] [h: Strength=Strength+6] [h: varMods = hmb.getStrMods()] [h: Strength=TempStr] [h: newDmg = json.get(varMods,"DMG")] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"DMG",newDmg-OldDmg)] }; {}]
<!-- One-handed Weapon only. --> [h, if(FightingStyle=="M1"), code: { [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"SPD",-1)] }; {}]
<!-- One handed weapon, used two-handed. --> [h, if(FightingStyle=="H1H2"), code: { [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"SPD",+2)] }; {}]
<!-- Two one-handed weapons, attacking with both. --> [h, if(FightingStyle=="M1M1O"), code: { [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"SPD",+2)]
[h: varMods = hmb.getStrMods()] [h: oldDmg = json.get(varMods,"DMG")] [h: TempStr=Strength] [h: Strength=Strength-2] [h: varMods = hmb.getStrMods()] [h: Strength=TempStr] [h: newDmg = json.get(varMods,"DMG")] [h: TypeProfile2 = json.set(TypeProfile2,"SPD",+2)] [h: TypeProfile2 = json.set(TypeProfile2,"DMG",newDmg-OldDmg)] [h: TypeProfile2 = json.set(TypeProfile2,"ATK",-4)] }; {}]
<!-- Two one-handed weapons, defending with secondary weapon. --> [h, if(FightingStyle=="M1M1D"), code: { [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"DEF",0)] }; {}]
<!-- Shield only. --> [h, if(FightingStyle=="S1"), code: { [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"DEF",+1)] }; {}]
<!-- Two shields only. --> [h, if(FightingStyle=="S1S1"), code: { [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"DEF",0)] }; {}]
[TypeProfiles = '[{},{}]'] [TypeProfiles = json.set(TypeProfiles,0,TypeProfile)] [TypeProfiles = json.set(TypeProfiles,1,TypeProfile2)]
[r: macro.return = TypeProfiles]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: getFightingStyleMods

[h, if(json.type(currentPlayer) != "UNKNOWN"), code: { [h: Action=resetCount1] [h: Info="Primary Attack"] [h: currentPlayer=json.set(currentPlayer, "ActionCount", Action)] [h: currentPlayer=json.set(currentPlayer, "Info", Info)]
[h, if(FightingStyle == "M1M1O"), code: { [h: Action=resetCount2] [h: Info="Secondary Attack"] [h: currentPlayer=json.set(currentPlayer, "ActionCount2", Action)] [h: currentPlayer=json.set(currentPlayer, "Info2", Info)] }; { [h: Action=resetCount2] [h: Info="NONE"] [h: currentPlayer=json.set(currentPlayer, "ActionCount2", Action)] [h: currentPlayer=json.set(currentPlayer, "Info2", Info)] }] }; {}]
[h: setInitiative(currentPlayer)]

<!--Targets evenly heals wounds in order from largest to smallest -->
[h, if(macro.args==""), code:
{
	[h: Healing=Healing_Amount]
};
{
	[h: Healing=macro.args]
}]

[h: Healing = if(json.length(Wounds)==0,0,Healing)]

[h:i=0]
[h: TempWounds = json.sort(Wounds,"d","Sev")]
[h, while(Healing > 0 && i < json.length(TempWounds), ""), code:
{
	[h: TempWounds = json.set(TempWounds,i,json.set(json.get(TempWounds,i),"Sev",json.get(json.get(TempWounds,i),"Sev")-1))]
	[h: i=i+1]
	[h: Healing = Healing-1]
}]
[h:Wounds = TempWounds]
[h, if(Healing>0), code:
{
	[macro("CleanWounds@Lib:HackMaster"): ""]
	[macro("HealSpread@this"): Healing]
};
{
	[macro("CleanWounds@Lib:HackMaster"): ""]
}]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--
	Macro: Range Defense Roll
-->
[h: dieMod=0]
[h: crit=1d6e-1]
[h: mod=0]

<!-- 
Check for Shield
-->
[h, if(getPropertyType() == "HM_PC"), code:
{
	[h: OffHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","OffHand")]
	[h: WBaseType=if(json.get(OffHand, "BaseType")=="Shield","Shield","NONE")]
	[h: ShieldUsed = if(WBaseType=="Shield",1,0)]
};
{
	[h: OffHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","OffHand")]
	[h: WBaseType=if(json.get(OffHand, "BaseType")=="Shield","Shield","NONE")]
	[h: ShieldUsed = if(WBaseType=="Shield",1,0)]
}]

[h, switch(getSize()), code:
case "Tiny":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+10"]
	[h: dieMod = 10]
};
case "Small":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+8"]
	[h: dieMod = 8]
};
case "Medium":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+6"]
	[h: dieMod = 6]
};
case "Large":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+4"]
	[h: dieMod = 4]
};
case "Huge":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+2"]
	[h: dieMod = 2]
};
case "Gigantic":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e-2"]
	[h: dieMod = -2]
};
default:
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+12"]
	[h: dieMod = 12]
}]

[h: i_chkShield=0]
[h:status=input(
    "junkVar||Range Defense Roll|LABEL|TEXT=FALSE",
    "i_dieSize|d12e,d20e,"+fireMelee+"|Die Size|RADIO|ORIENT=H SELECT=1 VALUE=STRING",
	"i_mods|0|Modifiers",
	"i_chkDex|0|Dodge|CHECK")]
[h: abort(status)]

<!-- 
USE DEX?
-->
[h, if(getPropertyType() == "HM_PC" && i_chkDex==1), code:
{
	[h: varMods=json.get(hmb.getDexMods(),"DEF")]
	[h: mod=mod+if(varMods<0,0,VarMods)]
};
{}]

[h: actualRoll=if(i_dieSize == "d20e" || i_dieSize == fireMelee, d20, eval(i_dieSize))]
[h: dieMod = if(i_dieSize == "d20e" || i_dieSize == "d12e", 0, dieMod)]
[h: mod=mod+i_mods+0]

[h: roll = max(actualRoll+dieMod,1)]

Rolls for Defense:

[if(actualRoll==20), code:
{
	[h: macro.return="total="+(roll+crit+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll+crit)+if(dieMod==0,"","+"+dieMod)+"+"+mod+"; ShieldUsed="+ShieldUsed+"; DefenseCrit="+1]	
	a Perfect Defense!
};
{
	[h: macro.return="total="+(roll+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll)+if(dieMod==0,"","+"+dieMod)+"+"+mod+"; ShieldUsed="+ShieldUsed+"; DefenseCrit="+0]
}]

[if(actualRoll==1), code:
{
	a FUMBLE!
};{}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: RangeDefenseRoll
FirstAid

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Macro: Defense roll NPC --> [h: dieMod=0] [h: crit=1d6e-1] [h: mod=macro.args+0]
<!-- Check for Shield --> [h, if(ShieldUse==1), code: { [h: OffHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","OffHand")] [h: WBaseType=if(json.get(OffHand, "BaseType")=="Shield","Shield","NONE")] [h: DefaultDie=if(WBaseType=="NONE",3,4)] }; { [h: DefaultDie=4] [h: WBaseType="NONE"] }]
[h: i_chkShield=0] [h:status=input( "junkVar||Defense Roll|LABEL|TEXT=FALSE", "i_dieSize|d8e,d10e,d12e,d20e-4,d20e|Die Size|RADIO|ORIENT=H SELECT="+DefaultDie+" VALUE=STRING", "i_mods|0|Modifiers", if(DefaultDie==3,"",if(WBaseType=="NONE","","i_chkShield|1|Shield|CHECK")))] [h: abort(status)]
<!-- USE SHIELD? --> [h, if(i_chkShield==0 && WBaseType=="Shield"), code: { [h: SBaseID = json.get(OffHand, "ID_BaseType")] [h: BaseShield = master.returnItem("Inventory","Shield",SBaseID)] [h: varMods = json.get(BaseShield,"Defense")] [h: mod = mod + if(varMods>0,-VarMods,VarMods)] [h: i_dieSize = if(i_dieSize == "d20e", "d20e-4", i_dieSize)] };{}]
[h: actualRoll=if(i_dieSize == "d20e" || i_dieSize == "d20e-4", d20, eval(i_dieSize))] [h: dieMod=if(i_dieSize == "d20e-4", -4, dieMod)] [h: mod=mod+i_mods+0]
[h: roll = max(actualRoll+dieMod,1)]
Rolls for Defense:
[if(actualRoll==20), code: { [h: macro.return="total="+(roll+crit+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll+crit)+if(dieMod==-4,-4,"")+"+"+mod] a Perfect Defense! }; { [h: macro.return="total="+(roll+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll)+if(dieMod==-4,-4,"")+"+"+mod] }]
[if(actualRoll==19), code: { a Near Perfect Defense! };{}]
[if(actualRoll==1), code: { a FUMBLE! };{}]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: assert(isNPC(), "ERROR: this macro is only used for NPCs", 0)]
<!-- PARSE STATBLOCK INFO --> [h: StatBlock=json.get(macro.args, "TextBox")] [h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "[\\w,\\/,\\',\\-,\\s]+(?=\\s\\()")] [h: rgx_Name=getGroup(id, 1, 0)] [h: clean_Name=""] [h, foreach(curPiece, rgx_Name, ""): clean_Name = clean_Name + curPiece + " "] [h: clean_Name = trim(clean_Name)] [if(rgx_Name != clean_Name): rgx_Name = "COMMA ERROR: "+clean_Name, ""]
[h: rgx_HP=rgx.get.HP()]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=HP\\s\\([0-9][0-9]/)[0-9]+")] [h: rgx_TOP=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=Init\\s)[\\+\\-0-9]+")] [h: rgx_Init=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=Spd\\s)[0-9]+")] [h: rgx_Speed=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=Rch\\s)[A-Za-z0-9]+")] [h: rgx_Rch=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: rgx_Att=rgx.get.Atk()]
[h: rgx_Dmg=rgx.get.Dmg()]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=Dmg\\s"+rgx_Dmg+")[\\+\\-0-9]+")] [h: rgx_UADmgMod=getGroup(id, 1, 0)] [pause("rgx_UADmgMod")]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=Def\\s)[\\+\\-0-9]+")] [h: rgx_Def=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=DR\\s)[0-9]+")] [h: rgx_DR=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: rgx_SZ=rgx.get.Size()]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=MV\\s)[0-9]+")] [h: rgx_Move=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: rgx_TOPsv=rgx.get.TOPsv()]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=SD\\s)[A-Za-z0-9\\s]+")] [h: rgx_SD=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h, if(rgx_UADmgMod!="ERROR"), code: { [h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<="+rgx_Dmg+if(rgx_UADmgMod>0,'\\+'+rgx_UADmgMod,rgx_UADmgMod)+"\\s\\()[A-Za-z0-9\\s]+")] }; { [h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<="+rgx_Dmg+"\\s\\()[A-Za-z0-9\\s]+")] [h: rgx_UADmgMod=0] }] [h: rgx_Weapon=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=DR\\s"+rgx_DR+"\\s\\()[A-Za-z0-9\\s]+")] [h: rgx_Armor=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "[\\+\\d](?=\\swith\\s)")] [h: rgx_ShieldDef=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=\\d\\swith\\s)[A-Za-z0-9\\s]+")] [h: rgx_Shield=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=EPV\\s)[0-9]+")] [h: rgx_EPV=getGroup(id, 1, 0)]
[h: rgxProps = setStrProp("","rgx_Name",rgx_Name)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_HP",rgx_HP)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_TOP",rgx_TOP)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Init",rgx_Init)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Speed",rgx_Speed)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Rch",rgx_Rch)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Att",rgx_Att)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Dmg",rgx_DmgFixed)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_DmgDie1",rgx_DmgDie1)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_DmgDie2",rgx_DmgDie2)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_UADmgMod",rgx_UADmgMod)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Def",rgx_Def)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_ShieldDef",rgx_ShieldDef)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_DR",rgx_DR)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_SZ",rgx_SZ)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Move",rgx_Move)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_TOPsv",rgx_TOPsv)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_SD",rgx_SD)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Weapon",rgx_Weapon)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Armor",rgx_Armor)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_Shield",rgx_Shield)] [h: rgxProps = setStrProp(rgxProps,"rgx_EPV",rgx_EPV)]
<!--DISPLAY PARSED DATA FOR VERIFICATION --> [dialog("Finilize NPC","width=370; height=450; temporary=1; input=1; noframe=0"): { [macro("FinalizeStatsDialog@This"): rgxProps] }]
[h: Inventory = getLibProperty("NPCInv","Lib:UniversalInventorySystem")]
[h: abort(0)]

[h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=Dmg\\s)[de0-9]+")] [h: rgx_Dmg1=getGroup(id, 1, 0)] [h: id = strfind(StatBlock, "(?<=Dmg\\s[0-9]\\@)[de0-9]+")] [h: rgx_Dmg2=getGroup(id, 1, 0)] [h: rgx_Dmg = if(rgx_Dmg2 == "ERROR", rgx_Dmg1, rgx_Dmg2)] [h: rgx_Dmg = if(rgx_Dmg == "None", "ERROR", rgx_Dmg)] [h, if(rgx_Dmg!="ERROR"), CODE: { [h: id = strfind(rgx_Dmg, "\\dd\\d+")] [h: rgx_DmgFixed=getGroup(id, 1, 0)+"e"] [h: id = strfind(rgx_Dmg, "\\d+")] [h: rgx_DmgDice=getGroup(id, 1, 0)] [h: rgx_DmgSides=getGroup(id, 2, 0)] [h: rgx_DmgDie1=if(ceiling(rgx_DmgDice/2) == rgx_DmgDice/2, (rgx_DmgDice/2)+"d"+rgx_DmgSides+"e", rgx_DmgFixed)] [h: rgx_DmgDie2=if(ceiling(rgx_DmgDice/2) == rgx_DmgDice/2, (rgx_DmgDice/2)+"d"+rgx_DmgSides+"e", 0)] }; { [h: rgx_DmgFixed=0] [h: rgx_DmgDice=0] [h: rgx_DmgSides=0] [h: rgx_DmgDie1=0] [h: rgx_DmgDie2=0] }]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: assert(isNPC(), "ERROR: this macro is only used for NPCs", 0)] [h: assert(if(getProperty("Character")==1,1,0), "ERROR: this token does not have the correct property set", 0)]
[h: varsFromStrProp(macro.args)]
[h:status=input( "junkVar||Damage Roll|LABEL|TEXT=FALSE", "i_dmgType|Unarmed,1/4 Damage,1/2 Damage,Normal,Critical,Quadruple|Damage Type|RADIO|ORIENT=V SELECT=3 VALUE=STRING")] [h: abort(status)]
[switch(i_dmgType), code: case "Unarmed": { [h: BaseWeapon = master.returnItem("Inventory","Melee Weapon",0)]
[H: DmgType = json.get(BaseWeapon,"Type")]
[h: Die1 = max(0,1d4e-2)] [h: Die2 = max(0,1d4e-2)] [h: Mods = DmgMod] [h: Total = max(1,Die1+Die2+Mods)] [h: DamageRoll = "1d4e-2 + 1d4e-2 + Mods = "+Die1+" + "+Die2+" + "+Mods]
Unarmed Damage Rolled: [t(Total): DamageRoll] }; case "1/4 Damage": { [h: Die = 0] [h: DmgDie = if(DmgType == "Hacking", DmgDie1, if(DmgType == "Crushing", DmgDie2, 1))] [h: Die = if(DmgType == "Hacking", max(0,eval(DmgDie1+"")), Die)] [h: Die = if(DmgType == "Crushing", max(0,eval(DmgDie2+"")), Die)] [h: Die = if(DmgType == "Piercing", 1, Die)] [h: Mods = DmgMod] [h: Total = max(1,ceiling(Die/2)+Mods)] [h: DamageRoll = DmgDie+"/2 + Mods = "+ceiling(Die/2)+" + "+Mods]
Damage Rolled: [t(Total): DamageRoll] }; case "1/2 Damage": { [h: Die = 0] [h: DmgDie = if(DmgType == "Hacking", DmgDie1, if(DmgType == "Crushing", DmgDie2, 1))] [h: Die = if(DmgType == "Hacking", max(0,eval(DmgDie1+"")), Die)] [h: Die = if(DmgType == "Crushing", max(0,eval(DmgDie2+"")), Die)] [h: Die = if(DmgType == "Piercing", 1, Die)] [h: Mods = DmgMod] [h: Total = max(1,Die+Mods)]
[h: DamageRoll = DmgDie+" + Mods = "+Die+" + "+Mods]
Damage Rolled: [t(Total): DamageRoll] }; case "Normal": { [h: Die1 = max(0,eval(DmgDie1+""))] [h: Die2 = max(0,eval(DmgDie2+""))] [h: Mods = DmgMod] [h: Total = max(1,Die1+Die2+Mods)] [h: DamageRoll = DmgDie1+" + "+DmgDie2+" + Mods = "+Die1+" + "+Die2+" + "+Mods]
Damage Rolled: [t(Total): DamageRoll] }; case "Critical": { [h: Die1 = max(0,eval(DmgDie1+""))] [h: Die2 = max(0,eval(DmgDie1+""))] [h: Die3 = max(0,eval(DmgDie2+""))] [h: Die4 = max(0,eval(DmgDie2+""))] [h: Mods = DmgMod] [h: Total = max(1,Die1+Die2+Die3+Die4+Mods)] [h: DamageRoll = DmgDie1+" + "+DmgDie1+" + "+DmgDie2+" + "+DmgDie2+" + Mods = "+Die1+" + "+Die2+" + "+Die3+" + "+Die4+" + "+Mods]
Damage Rolled: [t(Total): DamageRoll] }; case "Quadruple": { [h: Die1 = max(0,eval(DmgDie1+""))] [h: Die2 = max(0,eval(DmgDie1+""))] [h: Die3 = max(0,eval(DmgDie1+""))] [h: Die4 = max(0,eval(DmgDie1+""))] [h: Die5 = max(0,eval(DmgDie2+""))] [h: Die6 = max(0,eval(DmgDie2+""))] [h: Die7 = max(0,eval(DmgDie2+""))] [h: Die8 = max(0,eval(DmgDie2+""))] [h: Mods = DmgMod] [h: Total = max(1,Die1+Die2+Die3+Die4+Die5+Die6+Die7+Die8+Mods)] [h: DamageRoll = DmgDie1+" + "+DmgDie1+" + "+DmgDie1+" + "+DmgDie1+" + "+DmgDie2+" + "+DmgDie2+" + "+DmgDie2+" + "+DmgDie2+" + Mods = "+Die1+" + "+Die2+" + "+Die3+" + "+Die4+" + "+Die5+" + "+Die6+" + "+Die7+" + "+Die8+" + "+Mods]
Damage Rolled: [t(Total): DamageRoll] }; default: {}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: DamageRoll

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--
	Macro: Range Defense roll
	NPC
-->
[h: dieMod=0]
[h: crit=1d6e-1]
[h: mod=0]

<!-- 
Check for Shield
-->
[h, if(ShieldUse==1), code:
{
	[h: OffHand = inventory.returnEquipedItem("Inventory","OffHand")]
	[h: WBaseType=if(json.get(OffHand, "BaseType")=="Shield","Shield","NONE")]
	[h: ShieldUsed = if(WBaseType=="Shield",1,0)]
};
{
	[h: DefaultDie=4]
	[h: ShieldUsed = 0]
}]

[h, switch(getSize()), code:
case "Tiny":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+10"]
	[h: dieMod = 10]
};
case "Small":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+8"]
	[h: dieMod = 8]
};
case "Medium":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+6"]
	[h: dieMod = 6]
};
case "Large":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+4"]
	[h: dieMod = 4]
};
case "Huge":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+2"]
	[h: dieMod = 2]
};
case "Gigantic":
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e-2"]
	[h: dieMod = -2]
};
default:
{
	[h: fireMelee = "d20e+12"]
	[h: dieMod = 12]
}]

[h:status=input(
    "junkVar||Defense Roll|LABEL|TEXT=FALSE",
    "i_dieSize|d12e,d20e,"+fireMelee+"|Die Size|RADIO|ORIENT=H SELECT=1 VALUE=STRING",
	"i_mods|0|Modifiers")]
[h: abort(status)]

[h: actualRoll=if(i_dieSize == "d20e" || i_dieSize == fireMelee, d20, eval(i_dieSize))]
[h: mod=mod+i_mods+0]

[h: roll = max(actualRoll+dieMod,1)]

Rolls for Defense:

[if(actualRoll==20), code:
{
	[h: macro.return="total="+(roll+crit+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll+crit)+"+"+if(dieMod==0,"",dieMod)+"+"+mod]
	a Perfect Defense!
};
{
	[h: macro.return="total="+(roll+mod)+"; tooltip1="+i_dieSize+"+Mod="+(actualRoll)+"+"+if(dieMod==0,"",dieMod)+"+"+mod]
}]

[if(actualRoll==1), code:
{
	a FUMBLE!
};{}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: RangeDefenseRoll

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: varsFromStrProp(macro.args)] <!-- Skill Data Structure Json Name Abilitys Modifier Cost Universal Subskill Prereq Tally R0 R1 R2 R3 R4 R5 R6 R7 R8 R9 R10 RTotal --> [h: loops=0] [h: curName = ""] [h: curSubskill = ""] [h: Skills=getProperty("Skills")]
[h, while(loops < json.length(Skills) && (Name != curName || Subskill != curSubskill), ""), code: { [h: curSkill = json.get(Skills,loops)]
[h: curName = json.get(curSkill,"Name")] [h: curSubskill = json.get(curSkill,"Subskill")] <!--Look at every other Skill till you pass the correct one--> [h: loops=loops+1] }] [h: loops=loops-1]
[h:status=input( "junkVar||"+Name+"|LABEL|TEXT=FALSE", "i_Skill|"+Skill+"|Mastery", "i_chkDelete|0|Delete Skill|CHECK")] [h: abort(status)]
[h: curSkill=json.set(curSkill,"RTotal",i_Skill)] [h: curSkill=json.set(curSkill,"Tally",1)]
[h: Skills=if(i_chkDelete == 0, json.set(Skills,loops,curSkill), json.remove(Skills,loops))] [h: setProperty("Skills",Skills)]
[macro("Build_HTML_Skills@This"): ""] [r, macro("RefreshNPCSheet@This"): "Main"] [h: abort(0)]

[h: HP=MaxHP] [h: Reach=0]
[h: CurrentProfile = '[]'] [h: NewEnh = master.returnEmptyItemOfType("Enhancement","MagicType")]
<!-- Generate Total ---> [h: NewEnh = json.set(NewEnh,"Name","Race_")] [h: TypeProfile = NewEnh] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"ATK",Attack)] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"SPD",Speed)] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"DEF",Defense)] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"DMG",UADmgMod)] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"INIT",Initiative)] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"RCH",Reach)] [h: TypeProfile = json.set(TypeProfile,"DR",DR)] [h: CurrentProfile = json.append(CurrentProfile,TypeProfile)]
[h: bar.NPCHealth = HP/MaxHP]
[h, macro("InitializeSkillList@Lib:HackMaster_NPC"): ""] [h, macro("CalcBaseRace@Lib:HackMaster_NPC"): ""] [h, macro("CalcCombatProfile@Lib:HackMaster_NPC"): ""]
[h: vars = "Sheet='Equipment';Other=0;"]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: targetID = getSelected()] [r: getName(targetID)] [h, token(targetID): old.HPs = HP] [macro("FirstAid@Lib:HackMaster"): ""] First-Aid is attempted on all [r: getName(targetID)]'s wounds. [r: getName(targetID)] regained [r: macro.return] HPs.
[macro("CleanWounds@Lib:HackMaster"): targetID] [h, token(targetID): bar.Health = HP/MaxHP] [h, token(targetID): new.HPs = HP] HPs: [r: old.HPs]>>[r: new.HPs]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: TopRoll = max(0,(TOPDie-TOPSave)*5)] [r: token.name] is incapacitated for [r: TopRoll] seconds.
[h: state.Incapacitated = if(TopRoll >0,1,state.Incapacitated)]
[h, if(TopRoll>0), code: { [CountUpdate( token.name, 1, "Incapacitated", TopRoll, "Modifier_Action")]
[CountUpdate( token.name, 2, "NONE", TopRoll, "Modifier_Action")]
[RedrawInit()] };{}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: TOPSave

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: assert(getImpersonatedName() != "","Impersonate your token.")] [H: msg = if ( state.AFK == 1 , "Back", "Away From Keyboard" ) ] [H: state.AFK = if (state.AFK == 1, 0, 1 ) ] [R: msg ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: AFK

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[r: token.name] is leveling his stats.
[h: status=input("i_Strength|1d4e,1d6e,1d8e,1d10e,1d12e,1d20e|Strength:"+Strength+"|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING", "i_Intelligence|1d4e,1d6e,1d8e,1d10e,1d12e,1d20e|Intelligence:"+Intelligence+"|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING", "i_Wisdom|1d4e,1d6e,1d8e,1d10e,1d12e,1d20e|Wisdom:"+Wisdom+"|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING", "i_Dexterity|1d4e,1d6e,1d8e,1d10e,1d12e,1d20e|Dexterity:"+Dexterity+"|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING", "i_Constitution|1d4e,1d6e,1d8e,1d10e,1d12e,1d20e|Constitution:"+Constitution+"|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING", "i_Charisma|1d4e,1d6e,1d8e,1d10e,1d12e,1d20e|Charisma:"+Charisma+"|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING")] [h: abort(status)]
[t: Strength=Strength+eval(i_Strength)/100] [t: Intelligence=Intelligence+eval(i_Intelligence)/100] [t: Wisdom= Wisdom+eval(i_Wisdom)/100] [t: Dexterity=Dexterity+eval(i_Dexterity)/100] [t: Constitution=Constitution+eval(i_Constitution)/100] [t: Charisma=Charisma+eval(i_Charisma)/100]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Level Stats

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: NameList = getSelectedNames('json')] [h: TargetList = ""] [h, FOREACH(Name, NameList), code: { [curInfo = json.set("{}","Name",Name)] [curInfo = json.set(curInfo,"MaxHP",getProperty("MaxHP",Name))] [curInfo = json.set(curInfo,"Attack",getProperty("Attack",Name))] [TargetList = json.append(TargetList, curinfo)] }] [h: TargetList = json.sort(TargetList, "a", "MaxHP")] [h:status=input( "AffectedHPs|90|Affected HPs", "SaveDC|0|Mage's d20e+Level Roll", "SleepDuration|60|Duration")] [h: abort(status)] Sleep Spell:
HPs Affected: [t: AffectedHPs], Target Save: [t: SaveDC], Sleep Duration: [t: SleepDuration]
[h: TotalHPs = 0] [FOREACH(curTarget, TargetList, ""), code: { [h: TotalHPs = TotalHPs + json.get(curTarget, "MaxHP")] [h: curName = json.get(curTarget, "Name")] [h: curAttack = json.get(curTarget, "Attack")] [if(TotalHPs <= AffectedHPs), code: { [h: switchToken(curName)] [h: curRoll = d20e + curAttack] [h: state.Disabled = if(curRoll < SaveDC, 1, state.Disabled)] [h, if(curRoll < SaveDC): CountUpdate( token.name, 1, "Sleeping", SleepDuration, "Modifier_Action"); ""] [r: curName]: [r: " "+curRoll] [r: if(state.Disabled == 0, "- Saves", "- Failed")]
}; {}] }] [h: RedrawInit()]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: SleepSpell

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h, if(getPropertyType() != "HM_PC"), code: { [h: abort(0)] };{}] [h: masterTalProfSpec = getLibProperty("Talents","Lib:UniversalInventorySystem")] [h: masterTalentType = json.get(masterTalProfSpec, "Properties")] [h: Talents = json.set(Talents, "Properties", masterTalentType)] [h: Items = inventory.returnItemsOfType("Talents","Talent")] [h, for(i, 0, json.length(Items), 1, "
"), code: { [h: curItem = json.get(Items,i)] [h: curSlotType = json.get(curItem, "SlotType")] [if(curSlotType == ""), code: { [h: curItem = json.set(curItem,"SlotType","ALL")] [h: Items = json.set(Items, i, curItem)] };{}] }] [h: AllItems = json.get(Talents,"Items")] [h: AllItems = json.set(AllItems, "Talent", Items)] [h: Talents=json.set(Talents,"Items",AllItems)] [h, macro("CalcCombatProfile@Lib:HackMaster"): ""] Updated
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: UpdateTokenVersion 1.73

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: assert(isNPC(), "ERROR: this macro is only used for NPCs", 0)] [h: assert(if(getProperty("Character")==1,1,0), "ERROR: this token does not have the correct property set", 0)]
Takes a [t: Damage_Taken=Damage_Taken] damage wound.
<!--HP remaining: [gm: HP = HP - Damage_Taken]-->
[h: bar.NPCHealth = HP/MaxHP]
[h: state.Dead = if(HP <=0, 1,0)] [h, if(state.Dead): newRemoveFromInitiative();""]
[h: HP = if(HP>MaxHP,MaxHP,HP)]
[h: IsTOP = Damage_Taken+" > "+TOP] [t(if(Damage_Taken>TOP," Potential TOP!","")): IsTOP]
